participant_1.name: Alexis
participant_1.personality: Introverted and innovative, often lost in thought but passionate about technology and gaming.
participant_1.background: i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i can drive a tractor. i enjoy listening to classical music. my favorite color is red. my sister is a pole dancer. i'm a christian.
